import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardGroup, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Product({product}) { return ( {product.name} {product.category} {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
${product.price} ); } export default Product;
